pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, July 19, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Lower Mainland, British Columbia

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement on oceans protection and hold a media availability. Minister of Transport Omar Alghabra and Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Joyce Murray will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local children’s day camp.

Note for media:

  • Restricted pooled coverage
